tweet.text: Current or recent grad student in the history of U.S. in the World? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work with @HistoryAtState on the #FRUS series! #PMF applications accepted until Oct. 12 at NOON (Eastern Time): https://t.co/9MdLibXAXh https://t.co/zoJcQu42Tq
tweet.html: Current or recent grad student in the history of U.S. in the World? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work with @HistoryAtState on the #FRUS series! #PMF applications accepted until Oct. 12 at NOON (Eastern Time): bit.ly/OH-PMF
